value.title: Bell and Amazon Web Services bring 5G Edge Compute to Canada
value.excerpt: CNW Telbec/ - Bell today announced the launch of the first public multi-access edge computing (MEC) with AWS Wavelength in Canada. Building on Bell's agreement with AWS, announced last year, together the two companies are deploying AWS Wavelength Zones throughout the country at the edge of Bell's 5G network starting in Toronto.
